item.title: Bull: 1×23
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull and the Trial Analysis Corp. team travel to Miami with top criminal defense attorney J.P. Nunnelly to work on a controversial drug trafficking case in which both the client’s and the jurors’ lives are in danger.
item.content:encoded: Bull and the Trial Analysis Corp. team travel to Miami with top criminal defense attorney J.P. Nunnelly to work on a controversial drug trafficking case in which both the client’s and the jurors’ lives are in danger.

item.title: Bull: 1×22
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull works with top criminal defense attorney J.P. Nunnelly on the first of three cases to repay her for defending Benny at trial. However, they clash over their client, a computer cloud company that is battling the F.B.I. to retain privacy over their customer’s flies that could help identify the source of a recent eco-terrorist […]
item.content:encoded: Bull works with top criminal defense attorney J.P. Nunnelly on the first of three cases to repay her for defending Benny at trial. However, they clash over their client, a computer cloud company that is battling the F.B.I. to retain privacy over their customer’s flies that could help identify the source of a recent eco-terrorist attack.

item.title: Bull: 1×21
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull makes a deal with top criminal attorney J.P. Nunnelly to defend Benny when he goes to trial for misconduct in a case related to his former career with the District Attorney’s office.
item.content:encoded: Bull makes a deal with top criminal attorney J.P. Nunnelly to defend Benny when he goes to trial for misconduct in a case related to his former career with the District Attorney’s office.

item.title: Bull: 1×20
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: A young man he believes was brainwashed by a cult-like spiritual learning center to kill his father. Also, Danny and Chunk go undercover at the learning center to find the perpetrator responsible for their client’s reprogramming.
item.content:encoded: A young man he believes was brainwashed by a cult-like spiritual learning center to kill his father. Also, Danny and Chunk go undercover at the learning center to find the perpetrator responsible for their client’s reprogramming.

item.title: Bull: 1×19
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: When Bull assists Jules Caffrey, a high-powered attorney on trial for his fiancée’s murder, he takes advantage of his client’s penchant for courtroom theatrics by letting him defend himself
item.content:encoded: When Bull assists Jules Caffrey, a high-powered attorney on trial for his fiancée’s murder, he takes advantage of his client’s penchant for courtroom theatrics by letting him defend himself

item.title: Bull: 1×18
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: The bond between Chunk and Bull is tested when TAC takes on as a client the prime suspect in the death of Chunk’s fashion mentor killed during her own show. Meanwhile, Bull rekindles a romance with one of his toughest opponents.
item.content:encoded: The bond between Chunk and Bull is tested when TAC takes on as a client the prime suspect in the death of Chunk’s fashion mentor killed during her own show. Meanwhile, Bull rekindles a romance with one of his toughest opponents.

item.title: Bull: 1×17
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull funds a class-action lawsuit pitting thousands of victims against a bank that ran a corrupt pump-and-dump investment division, which puts his business at risk. Unbeknownst to Bull, Benny is being haunted by a trial from his past, which throws him off his game and threatens the success of the suit.
item.content:encoded: Bull funds a class-action lawsuit pitting thousands of victims against a bank that ran a corrupt pump-and-dump investment division, which puts his business at risk. Unbeknownst to Bull, Benny is being haunted by a trial from his past, which throws him off his game and threatens the success of the suit.

item.title: Bull: 3×22
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull works to convince a jury that an alleged murder was actually a tragic accident when TAC represents a woman charged with her 3-year-old stepdaughter’s death.
item.content:encoded: Bull works to convince a jury that an alleged murder was actually a tragic accident when TAC represents a woman charged with her 3-year-old stepdaughter’s death.

item.title: Bull: 2×22
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull’s team is rocked when their client, Elliott Miles, is found guilty of murder, and they must regroup as the trial enters the penalty phase in order to prevent him from being sentenced to death. But when new evidence emerges that could prove Elliott’s innocence, Bull must find a way to present it in court […]
item.content:encoded: Bull’s team is rocked when their client, Elliott Miles, is found guilty of murder, and they must regroup as the trial enters the penalty phase in order to prevent him from being sentenced to death. But when new evidence emerges that could prove Elliott’s innocence, Bull must find a way to present it in court without being found in contempt. Also, Marissa faces hard truths about her relationship with Bull.

item.title: Bull: 3×21
item.dc:creator: cobra11
item.description: Bull helps mount a defense for Taylor’s brother-in-law, Ralph Kelly, a prison guard charged with manslaughter for the drowning deaths of two inmates in the middle of a hurricane. During the trial, Bull aims to convince the jury that his client tried to prevent a “greater harm” when he abandoned his prison command to evacuate […]
item.content:encoded: Bull helps mount a defense for Taylor’s brother-in-law, Ralph Kelly, a prison guard charged with manslaughter for the drowning deaths of two inmates in the middle of a hurricane. During the trial, Bull aims to convince the jury that his client tried to prevent a “greater harm” when he abandoned his prison command to evacuate his own family.
